MapView¶

MapView Class module

MapView(dataset, geo_data, choro_data, ...)

A map view class to generate map using ipyleaflet Map and ipywidgets.

API Docs¶

class socioFetcher.mapview.MapView(dataset, geo_data, choro_data, fipsLookUp)[source]¶

A map view class to generate map using ipyleaflet Map and ipywidgets.

Type
